features.title: Everything You Need for Modern Customer Support
features.subtitle: Powerful features designed to help you provide exceptional customer service

0.title: 24/7 Availability
0.description: Your AI assistant never sleeps, providing instant responses to customer queries around the clock.

1.title: Smart Knowledge Base
1.description: Automatically learn from your documents, FAQs, and website content to provide accurate answers.

2.title: Analytics & Insights
2.description: Track conversation performance, customer satisfaction, and identify areas for improvement.

3.title: Secure & Compliant
3.description: Enterprise-grade security with GDPR compliance and data protection built-in.

4.title: Easy Integration
4.description: Seamlessly integrate with your existing website, CRM, and support tools.

5.title: Flexible Pricing
5.description: Choose the plan that fits your business needs with transparent, scalable pricing.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know about our AI customer support platform
faq.question_1: How quickly can I get started?
faq.answer_1: You can have your AI assistant up and running in under 10 minutes. Simply upload your content, customize the appearance, and embed the widget on your website.
faq.question_2: What types of content can the AI learn from?
faq.answer_2: Our AI can learn from PDFs, Word documents, web pages, FAQs, and even existing support tickets. It supports multiple languages and formats.
faq.answer_3: Yes, we use enterprise-grade security with end-to-end encryption. We're GDPR compliant and your data is never shared with third parties.
faq.question_4: Can I customize the chatbot's appearance?
faq.answer_4: Absolutely! You can customize colors, fonts, messages, and even add your company logo to match your brand perfectly.
faq.question_5: What if the AI doesn't know an answer?
faq.answer_5: When the AI doesn't have an answer, it can seamlessly transfer the conversation to a human agent or collect contact information for follow-up.
faq.question_6: Do you offer support and training?
faq.answer_6: Yes, we provide comprehensive onboarding, training materials, and dedicated support to help you get the most out of your AI assistant.

aboutUs.title: About Us
aboutUs.description: Learn more about Ainexo and our mission to transform customer service

hero.title: About Ainexo
hero.subtitle: We believe every business should have access to powerful, intelligent customer service solutions

mission.label: Our Mission
mission.title: Making Customer Service Accessible to Everyone
mission.description1: At Ainexo, we're passionate about using AI to help businesses deliver exceptional customer experiences. Our mission is to make advanced AI technology accessible and affordable for businesses of all sizes.
mission.description2: We understand that great customer service shouldn't be a luxury, but a standard. That's why we've built a platform that's powerful, easy to use, and affordable for everyone.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.description: A world where every business can provide intelligent, 24/7 customer support without increasing costs or compromising their values.

story.title: Our Story
story.paragraph1: Ainexo was founded in 2023 by a team of entrepreneurs and AI specialists who saw the frustrations small and medium-sized businesses faced with customer service. Traditional solutions were too expensive or too complex, while simpler tools lacked essential features.
story.paragraph2: We decided to bridge this gap by creating a platform that combines enterprise-grade AI with an intuitive user experience. After months of development and testing with early adopters, we launched Ainexo to the public.
story.paragraph3: Today, Ainexo helps hundreds of businesses in the Netherlands and beyond deliver better customer experiences, reduce costs, and allow their teams to focus on what matters most.

values.title: Our Values
values.subtitle: The principles that guide our work

innovation.title: Innovation
innovation.description: We stay ahead by adopting the latest AI technologies and continuously improving our platform.

customerFirst.title: Customer First
customerFirst.description: Your success is our success. We listen to your feedback and build features you truly need.

trust.title: Trust & Transparency
trust.description: We take privacy and security seriously and are always honest about what our platform can and cannot do.

simplicity.title: Simplicity
simplicity.description: Powerful technology doesn't have to be complex. We strive for simplicity in everything we do.

cta.title: Ready to Get Started?
cta.subtitle: Join hundreds of businesses transforming their customer service with Ainexo

featuresPage.description: Discover all the features of Ainexo to improve your customer service

hero.subtitle: Everything you need to deliver exceptional customer experiences, all in one platform

mainFeatures.subtitle: The essential tools that make your AI assistant powerful

instantAnswers.description: Answer customer questions immediately with AI-powered responses based on your knowledge base

securePrivate.description: GDPR-compliant with enterprise-grade security. Your data stays protected and private always

increaseConversions.title: Increase Conversions
increaseConversions.description: Convert more visitors into customers with intelligent suggestions and personalized guidance

available247.title: 24/7 Available
available247.description: Your AI assistant works day and night, so you never miss a customer

privacyPolicy.title: Privacy Policy
privacyPolicy.description: Learn how Ainexo collects, uses, and protects your personal data

intro.paragraph1: At Ainexo, we take your privacy seriously. This privacy policy explains how we collect, use, store, and protect your personal information when you use our services.
intro.paragraph2: By using our services, you agree to the collection and use of information in accordance with this policy. If you do not agree with this policy, please do not use our services.

dataCollection.title: What Data Do We Collect?
dataCollection.intro: We collect various types of information to provide and improve our services to you:
dataCollection.personalData: Personal data: Name, email address, company name, and contact information you provide during registration
dataCollection.usageData: Usage data: Information about how you use our services, including conversation history, IP addresses, and browser type
dataCollection.technicalData: Technical data: Information about your device, operating system, and network connection

howWeUse.title: How Do We Use Your Data?
howWeUse.intro: We use your data for various purposes:
howWeUse.purpose1: To provide and maintain our services, including training your AI assistant
howWeUse.purpose2: To improve your user experience and personalize our services
howWeUse.purpose3: To communicate with you about updates, support, and marketing messages
howWeUse.purpose4: To resolve issues and provide technical support
howWeUse.purpose5: To prevent fraud and ensure the security of our services

dataSecurity.title: Data Security
dataSecurity.intro: We take the security of your data seriously and implement various measures:
dataSecurity.measure1: Encryption of data in transit and at rest with industry-standard protocols
dataSecurity.measure2: Regular security audits and penetration testing
dataSecurity.measure3: Limited access to personal data based on need-to-know principles
dataSecurity.measure4: Hosting on secure servers in the EU (Frankfurt, Germany) in compliance with GDPR requirements

yourRights.title: Your Rights
yourRights.intro: Under GDPR, you have various rights regarding your personal data:
yourRights.right1: Right of access: You can request a copy of your personal data
yourRights.right2: Right to rectification: You can request to correct inaccurate data
yourRights.right3: Right to erasure: You can request to delete your data ('right to be forgotten')
yourRights.right4: Right to restriction: You can request to restrict the processing of your data
yourRights.right5: Right to portability: You can request to receive your data in a structured format
yourRights.right6: Right to object: You can object to the processing of your data

cookies.title: Cookies and Tracking
cookies.intro: We use cookies and similar tracking technologies to improve your experience and analyze the use of our services.
cookies.types: Essential cookies for authentication, analytical cookies for usage statistics, and preference cookies to remember your settings

thirdParties.title: Sharing with Third Parties
thirdParties.intro: We do not share your personal data with third parties, except in the following cases:
thirdParties.services: With service providers who help us deliver our services (e.g., hosting providers, payment processors), who are contractually obligated to protect your data

changes.title: Changes to This Policy
changes.content: We may update this privacy policy from time to time. We will notify you of changes by posting the updated policy on this page. We recommend reviewing this policy regularly for updates.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.description: If you have questions about this privacy policy or your personal data, please contact us:

termsOfService.title: Terms of Service
termsOfService.description: Read our terms of service for using Ainexo

intro.paragraph1: Welcome to Ainexo. These Terms of Service ('Terms') govern your use of our AI chatbot platform services. By accessing or using our services, you agree to these Terms.
intro.paragraph2: If you do not accept these Terms, you may not use our services. We recommend that you read these Terms carefully before using our services.

acceptance.title: Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.paragraph1: By creating an account or using our services, you confirm that you have read, understood, and accept these Terms. You also agree to comply with all applicable laws and regulations.
acceptance.paragraph2: If you are acting on behalf of an organization, you represent that you have the authority to bind that organization to these Terms.

accountRegistration.title: Account Registration
accountRegistration.paragraph1: To use our services, you must create an account and provide accurate, complete, and current information.
accountRegistration.paragraph2: You are responsible for protecting your account credentials and for all activities that occur under your account.
accountRegistration.paragraph3: You must notify us immediately of any unauthorized use of your account or other security breaches.

subscriptionBilling.title: Subscription & Billing
subscriptionBilling.paragraph1: Our services are offered based on various subscription plans with specific features and pricing.
subscriptionBilling.paragraph2: Payments are billed in advance on a monthly or annual basis, depending on your chosen plan. All amounts are exclusive of VAT, unless otherwise stated.
subscriptionBilling.paragraph3: You can cancel your subscription at any time. Cancellations take effect at the end of the current billing period.
subscriptionBilling.paragraph4: We do not offer refunds for partially used subscription periods, unless required by law.

useOfService.title: Use of Services
useOfService.intro: When using our services, you agree not to:
useOfService.prohibited1: Use the services for illegal purposes or in violation of these Terms
useOfService.prohibited2: Attempt to gain unauthorized access to our systems or networks
useOfService.prohibited3: Use the services to distribute harmful content or harass others
useOfService.prohibited4: Reverse engineer our services or attempt to extract the source code
useOfService.prohibited5: Use the services to send spam or deceive others

intellectualProperty.title: Intellectual Property
intellectualProperty.paragraph1: All rights, titles, and interests in and to our services (excluding your content) remain the property of Ainexo and our licensors.
intellectualProperty.paragraph2: You retain all rights to the content you upload to our services. By uploading content, you grant us a license to use that content to provide our services.
intellectualProperty.paragraph3: You may not use our trademarks, logos, or trade names without our prior written consent.

limitationLiability.title: Limitation of Liability
limitationLiability.paragraph1: Our services are provided 'as is' without any warranty. We do not guarantee that our services will be error-free, uninterrupted, or completely secure.
limitationLiability.paragraph2: To the extent permitted by law, we are not liable for indirect, incidental, special, or consequential damages arising from your use of our services.

termination.title: Termination
termination.paragraph1: We reserve the right to suspend or terminate your account if you violate these Terms or if we reasonably believe you are misusing our services.
termination.paragraph2: Upon termination, your access to our services will be terminated and we may delete your account data.

dataPrivacy.title: Data Privacy
dataPrivacy.content: Your use of our services is also subject to our Privacy Policy, which describes how we collect, use, and protect your personal data.

changes.title: Changes to Terms
changes.content: We may update these Terms from time to time. If we make material changes, we will notify you via email or by posting a notice in our services. Your continued use of our services after such changes means you accept the updated Terms.

governingLaw.title: Governing Law
governingLaw.content: These Terms are governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of the Netherlands, without regard to any conflicting legal provisions.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.description: If you have questions about these Terms of Service, please contact us:

pricingPage.title: Create your first AI Agent
pricingPage.description: Flexible pricing plans that are tailored to meet the demands of various industries and company sizes.

freeTrial.title: Start your free trial
freeTrial.description: No credit card required, free forever until your credits run out
freeTrial.detail: Start with 20 message credits monthly and store up to 50 webpages.

addOns.title: Add-Ons
addOns.subtitle: Extra Message Credits
addOns.description: Add an extra 1000 message credits for a one-time fee.

comparison.title: Compare all features

howItWorksSite.title: Get started in
howItWorksSite.subtitle: No technical skills required. Set up your AI chatbot in minutes, not days.

step1.title: Connect your data
step1.description: Upload your documents, connect your website, or integrate with your existing helpdesk. Ainexo automatically indexes everything.

step2.title: Customize your agent
step2.description: Define your chatbot's personality, tone, and behavior. Set up custom greetings and configure how it handles different types of queries.

step3.title: Deploy everywhere
step3.description: Add Ainexo to your website with a simple embed code. Your AI agent is now live and ready to help your customers 24/7.

ctaSite.title: Ready to transform your customer support?
ctaSite.description: Join thousands of businesses using Ainexo to deliver exceptional customer experiences. Start your free trial today.

featuresSite.title: Everything you need to
featuresSite.subtitle: your support
featuresSite.description: Ainexo provides all the tools you need to deliver exceptional customer experiences at scale.

trainAI.title: Train AI Agents on your data
trainAI.description: Upload documentation and integrate with help desk systems. Ainexo learns from PDFs, URLs, Zendesk, and other sources to provide accurate responses.

customizable.title: Fully customizable to fit your brand
customizable.description: Customize your chatbot's role, tone, style, and write custom instructions to give your chatbot a behavior and personality.

trainConversations.title: Train Chatbot on real-time conversations
trainConversations.description: Don't like a response your chatbot is giving out? Train your chatbot to learn from its mistakes by informing it of what is a model answer.

gdprCompliant.title: GDPR Compliant & SOC 2 Certified
gdprCompliant.description: Industry-grade compliance ensures your data is protected with enterprise-level security standards.

fastSetup.title: Super fast, 5-minute setup
fastSetup.description: 5 minutes is all it takes for the Chatbot to train on your website and files. Once done, you can instantly converse with it.

analytics.title: Built-in Analytics Dashboard
analytics.description: Track every metric that matters in one powerful dashboard that quantifies your chatbot's ROI and reveals exactly where to optimize.

pricingSite.title: Simple, transparent
pricingSite.subtitle: Start for free, upgrade as you grow. No hidden fees.

starter.name: Starter
starter.description: Perfect for small websites and personal projects

professional.name: Professional
professional.description: For growing businesses with more traffic

enterprise.name: Enterprise
enterprise.description: For large organizations with specific needs

testimonials.title: Businesses with successful customer service start with

testimonial1.quote: Ainexo has revolutionized our customer support. We've reduced response time by 80% and our customers love the instant help.
testimonial1.author: Sarah Johnson

testimonial2.quote: The setup was incredibly easy. Within 5 minutes, we had an AI chatbot that actually understood our product documentation.
testimonial2.author: Michael Chen

testimonial3.quote: The accuracy of responses is impressive. Our support team can now focus on complex issues while Ainexo handles the routine queries.
testimonial3.author: Emily Rodriguez

contactPage.title: Looking for support?
contactPage.description: Send us a message and a team member will get back to you as soon as possible.

messages.welcome: Welcome to Ainexo! How can I help you today?
messages.userExample: Hi can you help me to track my order?
messages.agentResponse: Sure, please hold on for a second.
